head.title: Metro Business Briefing; WCBS-TV NEWS PARTNERSHIP

identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Media, Entertainment and Publishing

hedline.hl1: Metro Business Briefing; WCBS-TV NEWS PARTNERSHIP

abstract.p: WCBS-TV in New York will introduce partnership with television, radio and online media outlets on Oct 30 that pools organizations' resources to provide news coverage; WCBS-TV, channel 2, will broadcast reports from the news consortium, which will be called CBS 2 Information Network (S)

block.p: WCBS-TV in New York will introduce a partnership with television, radio and online media outlets on Monday that pools the organizations' resources to provide news coverage. WCBS-TV, channel 2, will broadcast reports from the news consortium, which will be called the CBS 2 Information Network. The WCBS-TV News 2 division, one of the partners, will be renamed CBS 2. Its news segments will use resources and content from other partners, including: CBS News, CNN, Court TV, The Daily News, Hollywood.com, Office.com and VH1 News. In addition, CBS 2 will televise VH1 News documentaries, Court TV crime reports and Office.com business stories. Many CBS 2 stories will be available at www.cbsnewyork.com.

Its news segments will use resources and content from other partners, including: CBS News, CNN, Court TV, The Daily News, Hollywood.com, Office.com and VH1 News. In addition, CBS 2 will televise VH1 News documentaries, Court TV crime reports and Office.com business stories. Many CBS 2 stories will be available at www.cbsnewyork.com.
